snippet.title: Petal Crash - Final Trailer
snippet.description:
Petal Crash is a brand new arcade action puzzle game by Friend & Fairy, the creator of Grapple Force Rena! Slide colorful blocks and crash them into cascading combos across a wide variety of game modes! Whether you're going head to head in the fiercely competitive Versus Mode, unraveling brain teasers and making your own in Puzzle Mode, chasing high scores in Solo Play, or following your favorite character on a journey through Story Mode, Petal Crash has something for everyone!

Petal Crash is a game by T. Ashley Jenkins, featuring music by Michael Staple and writing by Zack Morrison!

Follow Petal Crash on Twitter here:
https://twitter.com/PetalCrash
